title: Kanguru Launches The New UltraLock™ USB-C M.2 NVMe SSD With SuperSpeed+ Performance
text:
MILLIS, Mass. — Kanguru has launched its newest and fastest external Solid State Drive with SuperSpeed+ Connectivity. The new Kanguru UltraLock™ USB-C M.2 NVMe SSD is super fast for high-speed data transfers, and packs lots of great convenient features into such a small device.

Kanguru announces the new Kanguru UltraLock USB-C M.2 NVMe SSD, an external SSD with secure firmware, physical write protect switch and SuperSpeed+ USB3.1 Gen 2 connectivity.

“The new Kanguru UltraLock USB-C M.2 NVMe Solid State Drive combines cutting edge interface technology with high-quality SSDs to create one of the fastest USB storage devices currently available on the market,” says Ken Lee, Product Manager at Kanguru. “Customers will be in awe of SuperSpeed+ performance when combined with NVMe SSDs. And of course we kept the physical write protect switch and secure firmware, which are the cornerstones of the UltraLock product line.”

With SuperSpeed+ USB 3.1 Gen 2 connectivity, the new Kanguru UltraLock NVMe SSD can reach sequential read speeds of up to 675 MB/s and up to 575 MB/s sequential write, making it one of the fastest USB storage devices on the market.

The Kanguru UltraLock USB-C M.2 NVMe SSD is the ideal solution for those on the go, offering SuperSpeed+ data transfers, tons of storage space and malware protection. The UltraLock contains lots of great features:

SuperSpeed+ USB 3.1 Gen 2 Connectivity

Secure Firmware

Physical Write Protect Switch

Available in 250GB, 500GB, 1T, and 2T Capacities

TAA Compliant

Ideal platform for launching virtual environments

Along with SuperSpeed+ transfer speed, the additional features offered by this drive are unparalleled. The Secure firmware prevents BadUSB malware attacks by a third-party, and the UltraLock is the world’s only external SSD with a physical write protect switch, ideal for protecting your critical data from viruses or accidental overwriting.

For more information about the new Kanguru UltraLock USB-C M.2 NVMe SSD, or other Kanguru products, please visit kanguru.com or call 1-888-KANGURU.

Kanguru Solutions (www.kanguru.com) is a global leader in manufacturing high-quality data storage products, providing the very best in military-grade, FIPS 140-2 Certified, hardware encrypted, secure USB drives and fully-integrated remote management security applications. Kanguru also manufactures standard USB data storage drives with a physical write protect switch, and duplication equipment for cloning hard drives, SSDs, blu-ray, DVDs and more.
